participant_1.background:
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.
I enjoy a cheeseburger once in a while, but I make sure to get in my daily exercise to stay fit.
i enjoy golfing.
I’m a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom’s health.
i am on a keto diet.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
i love fishing.
I am blind and my family are my eyes.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.

content.text: Hey, how’s your day going?
Hey, I’m blind and my family are my eyes! How’s your day going?
I’m glad to hear that your family is so supportive of you! My day is going pretty well, thanks for asking!
That’s good to hear! What are you doing today?
I’m just hanging out and relaxing. I’m going to go golfing later this afternoon.
That sounds fun! I love golfing. Do you have any pets?
No, I don’t have any pets. I’m too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
That’s understandable! I don’t have any pets either because I’m single and I enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
That’s cool! What kind of art do you do?
I make cosplay costumes. I’m actually working on a new one right now!
That’s awesome! I’m sure it’s going to look great!
Thanks! I’m hoping to finish it by the end of the week.
Good luck! I’m sure you’ll do great!
Thanks! What’s your favorite thing to do when you’re not golfing?
I like to read, watch Game of Thrones, and spend time with my family.
I love Game of Thrones too! I’m so excited for the new season to come out.
Me too! I’m not sure how I’m going to wait until then.
Me neither! I’m going to have to re-watch the whole series again.
That’s a good idea! I might have to do that too.
We should watch it together sometime!
That would be fun
